title: Reference error in render is swallowed, results in `Cannot read property '_currentElement' of null`
body:
Using `react@0.14.0-beta2` Rendering the following should reproduce it: ``` import React from 'react'; class MyComponent extends React.Component { render() { const handleSubmit = R.tap(console.log.bind(console)); return (
foo
); } } ``` The import for `R` is missing, thus causing a `ReferenceError`, but React seems to swallow that error and instead reports: ``` Unhandled promise rejection TypeError: Cannot read property '_currentElement' of null at ReactCompositeComponentMixin._updateRenderedComponent (http://127.0.0.1:8020/assets/portal-application.js:101424:53) at ReactCompositeComponentMixin._performComponentUpdate (http://127.0.0.1:8020/assets/portal-application.js:101409:11) at ReactCompositeComponentMixin.updateComponent (http://127.0.0.1:8020/assets/portal-application.js:101338:13) at ReactPerf.measure.wrapper [as updateComponent] (http://127.0.0.1:8020/assets/portal-application.js:10491:22) at ReactCompositeComponentMixin.receiveComponent (http://127.0.0.1:8020/assets/portal-application.js:101270:11) at Object.ReactReconciler.receiveComponent (http://127.0.0.1:8020/assets/portal-application.js:11792:23) at ReactCompositeComponentMixin._updateRenderedComponent (http://127.0.0.1:8020/assets/portal-application.js:101427:24) at ReactCompositeComponentMixin._performComponentUpdate (http://127.0.0.1:8020/assets/portal-application.js:101409:11) at ReactCompositeComponentMixin.updateComponent (http://127.0.0.1:8020/assets/portal-application.js:101338:13) at ReactPerf.measure.wrapper [as updateComponent] (http://127.0.0.1:8020/assets/portal-application.js:10491:22) ``` This was pretty frustrating to debug so I hope it's fixable!
